message:
Guys, I'm trying to clone a repo from bitbucket (SSH), my laptop is connected to TEdata ADSL via wifi. each time I get the following error:

fatal: The remote end hung up unexpectedly
fatal: early EOF
fatal: index-pack failed

I googled and found some advice that it might be a network issue.

I tried to connect via cable & restarted the router with no luck.

After that I connected via Etisalat 3G Hotspot and everything worked fine.

My question is: Does any of you guys have recently encountered such issue? Would it be some sort of blocking via Tedata?

Thanks

data.message: Happened to me a billion times and after waiting a while it works. Never found a reason but my interpretation is that it's a temporary outage in BitBucket.
http will work fine, i've faced the same case before
Happened to me, https worked fine, you can authenticate using your Bitbucket user and password instead of an ssh key
